title: Why can't my phone be discovered by other Bluetooth devices?
answer:
Bluetooth has been turned off on your phone. 

 Turn on Bluetooth from Settings or the notification panel. 

 Bluetooth is turned on, but your phone is not set to be visible to other devices. 

 [To set your phone to be visible to other devices: Go to Settings, touch Bluetooth, and touch your phone's name (generally in the first line).]()
